GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
soc: qcom: aoss: Fix refcount leak in qmp_cooling_devices_register

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 053543ac1d095132fcfd1263805d6e25afbdc6a8, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 05589b30b21ac0273970b61edd50c07d2ba156af. For more details please see the references link.
